00006 TerrainData::TerrainData(unsigned int l_terrainLength)
00007 {
00008 
00009     printf("TerrainData patch width %i height %i made\n", l_terrainLength, l_terrainLength);
00010 
00011     //Set the terrains widths and heights in the class
00012     m_terrainLength = l_terrainLength;
00013 
00014     //Allocate memory for the terrain data
00015     m_terrainData = new float[m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength];
00016 
00017     //Allocate memory for the UV data
00018     m_uvData = new float[m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength * 2];
00019 
00020     //Allocate memory for lighting data
00021     m_lightmapData = new float[m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength];
00022 
00023     //Allocate memory for the normal data
00024     m_normalData = new float[m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength * 3];
00025 
00026     //Reset the terrain data to 0's
00027     for (unsigned int l_dataIterator = 0; l_dataIterator < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++l_dataIterator)
00028     {
00029         m_terrainData[l_dataIterator] = 0;
00030     }
00031 
00032     //Reset the UV data to 0
00033     for (unsigned int l_dataIterator = 0; l_dataIterator < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++l_dataIterator)
00034     {
00035         m_uvData[l_dataIterator] = 0;
00036     }
00037 
00038     //Reset the lighting data to 0
00039     for (unsigned int l_dataIterator = 0; l_dataIterator < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++l_dataIterator)
00040     {
00041         m_lightmapData[l_dataIterator] = 0;
00042     }
00043 
00044     //Reset the normal data to 0
00045     for (unsigned int l_dataIterator = 0; l_dataIterator < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++l_dataIterator)
00046     {
00047         m_normalData[l_dataIterator] = 0;
00048     }
00049 
00050     recalculateUV();
00051 }

00095 void TerrainData::generateUsingSineFaultAlgorythm(unsigned int l_numIterations, float l_distortionStart, float l_distortionMin, float l_sineCurveMagnitude)
00096 {
00097 
00098     //Used in several of the functions so might as well calculate it here
00099     float l_halfLength = m_terrainLength / 2;
00100     float l_halfHeight = m_terrainLength / 2;
00101 
00102     //Perform the iterations
00103     for (unsigned int l_currentIteration = 0; l_currentIteration < l_numIterations; l_currentIteration++)
00104     {
00105 
00106         //The displacement value
00107         float l_displacementValue = 0;
00108 
00109 
00110         //The displacement decreases every iteration twards d_min
00111 
00112         //If the current iteration is the last iteration
00113         if (l_currentIteration == l_numIterations)
00114         {
00115             l_displacementValue = l_distortionMin;
00116         }
00117         else
00118         {
00119             float currentIter = ((float) l_currentIteration) / l_numIterations;
00120             l_displacementValue = l_distortionStart + currentIter * ( l_distortionStart - l_distortionMin);
00121         }
00122 
00123         float a, b, c, w, d;
00124 
00125         //Generate the line to displace across
00126         d = sqrt((l_halfLength * l_halfLength) + (l_halfHeight * l_halfHeight));
00127 
00128         w = rand();
00129 
00130         a = cos(w);
00131         b = sin(w);
00132 
00133         c = ((float)rand() / RAND_MAX) * 2*d  - d;
00134 
00135         //For each point in the terrain
00136         for (unsigned int z = 0; z < m_terrainLength; ++z)
00137         {
00138 
00139             for (unsigned int x = 0; x < m_terrainLength; ++x)
00140             {
00141 
00142                 //Calculate the PD and divide it by the length of the sine slope
00143                 float pd = ( ((z - l_halfHeight) * a) + (( x - l_halfLength) * b) + c) / l_sineCurveMagnitude;
00144 
00145                 //Set max and min values
00146                 if (pd > 1.57) pd = 1.57;
00147                 else if (pd < 0) pd = 0;
00148 
00149                 //Apply it to the terrain data
00150                 m_terrainData[(z * m_terrainLength) + x] += (- l_displacementValue / 2) + (sin(pd) * l_displacementValue);
00151 
00152             }
00153 
00154         }
00155 
00156     }
00157 
00158 
00159     float lowestPoint = 100000.0f;
00160 
00161     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++i)
00162     {
00163         if (m_terrainData[i] < lowestPoint)
00164         {
00165             lowestPoint =m_terrainData[i];
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     float addValue = (-lowestPoint);
00170 
00171     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_terrainLength * m_terrainLength; ++i)
00172     {
00173         m_terrainData[i] += addValue;
00174     }
00175 
00176 }
00177 
00178 void TerrainData::recalculateUV()
00179 {
00180 
00181         unsigned int incrementCount, x, z, tuCount, tvCount;
00182         float incrementValue, tuCoordinate, tvCoordinate;
00183 
00184     //How much to increment by each count
00185     incrementValue = 1.0f / m_terrainLength;
00186 
00187     //How many times to increment
00188     incrementCount = m_terrainLength;
00189 
00190     //Set a default values for tu and tv
00191     tuCoordinate = 0;
00192     tvCoordinate = 0;
00193 
00194     //Reset counters
00195     tuCount = 0;
00196     tvCount = 0;
00197 
00198     for (z = 0; z < m_terrainLength; z++)
00199     {
00200 
00201         for (x = 0; x < m_terrainLength; x++)
00202         {
00203 
00204             m_uvData[((m_terrainLength * z) + x) * 2] = tuCoordinate;
00205             m_uvData[(((m_terrainLength * z) + x) * 2) + 1] = tvCoordinate;
00206 
00207             //increment the tu
00208             tuCoordinate += incrementValue;
00209 
00210             //Increment the count
00211             tuCount++;
00212 
00213             //If tuCount == incrementCount
00214             if (tuCount == incrementCount)
00215             {
00216                 //Reset them both
00217                 tuCoordinate = 0;
00218                 tuCount = 0;
00219             }
00220 
00221         }
00222 
00223         // Decement the tvCoordinate by the increment value
00224                 tvCoordinate += incrementValue;
00225 
00226                 //Increment the tvCount
00227                 tvCount++;
00228 
00229                 // Check if at the top of the texture and if so then start at the bottom again.
00230                 if(tvCount == incrementCount)
00231                 {
00232                         tvCoordinate = 0.0f;
00233                         tvCount = 0;
00234                 }
00235 
00236     }
00237 }
